column5: at man was detained on National Road 4
column6: between Km 92-93 in Chamkar Chek village
column11: was driving a vehicle (carrying land) in the village.------Several packages of white powder package (195)

column13: along with 21 glass ‘crack’ pipes.------The suspect and evidence was sent to the Kompong Speu Provincial Police Command. ------POST NEWS
